name: No Rails
description:
No Rails is a hyper-casual game for Android and VK Direct. In No Rails, you need to put rails on the way of train, collect coins and coal to get the train through the level. Various environment and full of fun rhythmic gameplay on board.

  • Номинация: Лучшая игра в жанре Hypercasual 
  • Номинация: Лучшая мобильная игра
